articles.title: A family journey to the origin of Juneteenth - CBS News
articles.description: Author and journalist Mark Whitaker visits Texas, where his great-grandfather became a free man in 1865, and meets with relatives for whom Juneteenth – America's second Independence Day – has taken on a special meaning.
articles.content: Today is not only Father's Day, it's also Juneteenth, the day which brought freedom to the last of all enslaved people in the United States. It's also our newest federal holiday. That the two coincid… [+4402 chars]

articles.author: Alasdair Belling
articles.title: How one man's court case opened the floodgates to a decade of gun violence in America - New Zealand Herald
articles.description: One court case back in 2003 changed the way Americans look at guns.
articles.content: Uvalde survivor: 'I don't want it to happen again'. Video / APIn 2003, policeman Dick Heller was part of a joint action in the US District Court of Washington, DC concerning the Second Amendment of t… [+7587 chars]
